body_html:
@chrert do any of the flags/instructions at the Intel website help: https://software.intel.com/en-us/articles/build-and-install-tensorflow-on-intel-architecture

In particular, they use --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" for building a pip package.
body_text:
@chrert do any of the flags/instructions at the Intel website help: https://software.intel.com/en-us/articles/build-and-install-tensorflow-on-intel-architecture
In particular, they use --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" for building a pip package.
body:
@chrert do any of the flags/instructions at the Intel website help: https://software.intel.com/en-us/articles/build-and-install-tensorflow-on-intel-architecture

In particular, they use --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" for building a pip package.
